TriggerCalib
=======================================================

Welcome to the TriggerCalib documentation.
This documentation covers the TISTOS method [1]_ for calculating trigger efficiencies and the ``HltEff`` family of offline analysis tools.
For any queries please join the `TriggerCalib Mattermost channel <https://mattermost.web.cern.ch/lhcb/channels/triggercalib>`_.

.. [1] \S. Tolk et al., *Data driven trigger efficiency determination at LHCb* (`LHCb-PUB-2014-039 <https://cds.cern.ch/record/1701134/files/LHCb-PUB-2014-039.pdf>`_), 2014



Acknowledgements
-------------------------------------------------------
